name: Rob L
quote: This was my second time getting my haircut by Danny and I am thoroughly impressed. He is very sharp at his craft. Pays close attention to detail and takes his time with your hair. More importantly he’s very professional. I promise you will get out of the chair highly satisfied. I definitely recommend his services!

name: Jenele G
quote: His professionalism, attention to detail, and overall expertise is top tier. He’s what anyone would want in a barber. I have been searching for a barber who specialized in cutting women hair for months and I definitely came to the right spot! Danny is super talented and he created a warm environment where I instantly felt comfortable.

name: Millicent
quote: The best hands down! Always leave loving my cut. Danny is really an artist. He understands head shape, balance and what cut and design will fit not just your face but also you style. The shop is clean and nicely lit. Fellow barbers are cool as well. Highly recommend scheduling with Danny.

name: Dwayne R
quote: Really nice guy! I look forward to working with him again. My schedule is crazy so to have an appointment happen on time is essential. Check his insta page out, the work speaks for itself. Thanks Danny ! Booking the next session now!
